Class Missile

  • java.lang.Object
    • alex.wilton.cs4303.p2.game.entity.Entity
      • alex.wilton.cs4303.p2.game.entity.Missile

  • public class Missile
extends Entity
    Class for modelling and drawing a Missile (and its explosion when it reaches its target)
